title: BRIEF-Fitch: EU-related supranational ratings unaffected by Brexit vote
author: Reuters Staff
description: * Does not expect a unilateral and sudden withdrawal of UK's capital from EIB
cleaned_text: June 28 (Reuters) - Fitch on EU: * Related supranational ratings unaffected by Brexit * not expect a unilateral and sudden withdrawal of UK's capital from EIB * Exit vote in UK referendum does not have immediate implications for ratings of EU and Euratom * UK vote to withdraw from EU, subsequent negative EU's creditworthiness if it results in a weakening of support for EU Source text for Eikon: ))
